climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: UPGRADE ERGONOMIC DESIGN: The home office desk chair with an S-shaped curve high back provides comfortable support for your back and lumbar.

ADJUSTABLE TILT MECHANISM: The multi-functional base of this ergonomic office chair is both equipped with tilt tension adjustment from 90° to 130° and tilt lock function. You could lie down by the tilt-lock function of this computer desk chair to relax from work stress.

PADDED FLIP-UP ARMRESTS: 90° Flip-up armrests of this home office chair could create a larger seating area, also convenient for storage when flipped up. When arms are flipped down, the ergonomic desk chair will ease pain and comfort your elbow.

COMFORTABLE & DURABLE OFFICE CHAIR: This executive office chair with a padded thick headrest and a high-density sponge cushion could make you feel continuously comfortable after a long time sitting. The home office chair using suede fabric is soft and skin-friendly, durable and no fading.

DIMENSION & SERVICE: Overall size of the smooth-rolling office desk chair with wheels and a sturdy base is 26.7"L x 23.6"W x 46-50"H. The maximum weight capacity is 300 lbs. This computer chair is easy to assemble with tools and instructions included. If you have quality problems, just contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Chair and I’m glad I bought it.
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble and well calibrated, everything fit together beautifully. The chair is nice looking, of good quality, and very comfortable. I am very satisfied!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Like the chair- pretty comfortable even after hours of sitting. Used daily since received. Love the fold up arms, but they could be a little lower when they are in 'arm rest' position; feels like I have my arms up wading through water, instead of resting at my side.No idea how it will hold up. If it lasts 5 good years before breaking down and getting uncomfortable, this is worth the price I paid (currently the chair is around $120).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wasnt expecting the softness.
reviews.reviewText: I am 6'2'' and most less expensive chairs the seat pan is very short and don't properly support my legs. This one does and the locking reclining function make it comfortable. I'm happy with the quality and look of the chair. Its nice and soft and you don't slide off it either. Assembly says 2 people needed. I did it by myself but it would have been nice to have someone hold things steady. I'm happy I went with this chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, comfortable, beautiful chair
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up and very comfortable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble. Easier with a drill/driver and bits. But comes with tools.The fabric is a nice color and soft to the touch. Cushions are comfortable. It rocks but takes a lot. Im 230lbs and I have to force it to rock .You can lock it in rear rock position. Love the folding armrests. Fits under the desk with that feature. Thigh support is short. Like alarmingly short. Enough to make it #1 measurement I pay attention to on future chairs. Was never a problem before this. School, work, home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful camel colored chair. Looks very expensive - well made and is very comfortable. The armrests are a little high for a "shorter person", but perfect for someone 6' or taller. Fortunately, they move up and out of the way, if needed. Very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Cute but uncomfortable
reviews.reviewText: I reeeeaallly wanted to like this chair. Its very cute and the fabric feels and looks great! Unfortunately the chair is super uncomfortable after sitting in it for a couple hours. My lower back starts to hurt and my neck hurts because of the way the seat back is curved. Really disappointed since it costs so much!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars does the job
reviews.reviewText: i love that the arm rests fold up, as a bigger guy i struggled with that with my last office chair. Armrests are VERY comfy, lets see how it holds up over time, i like the color and its very soft to the touch. i like the lean back on it although i agree with someone else on the reviews its a little odd to have to reach that far back to "lock " it into place. my arms are barely long enough to reach it, if they weren't then i think i would return it. support could be better but its still good in my opinion.Last and most important thing that i want to note and let eveyone know is that it does made sounds, if this is something that will eventually go away but its pretty loud for me, if i lean back and then come back to type i hear a loud pop or snap at the base of the chair. i have looked for a while to try to find where the issue is but have had no luck. I sent the vendor an email about it today so i will let yall know what they say. i have more positives on this chair than not.
